22 void set_zone_dissipation(BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone *zone,
23  unsigned num_tidal_frequency_breaks,
24  unsigned num_spin_frequency_breaks,
25  double *tidal_frequency_breaks,
26  double *spin_frequency_breaks,
27  double *tidal_frequency_powers,
28  double *spin_frequency_powers,
29  double reference_phase_lag)
30 {
31  Evolve::BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone *real_zone =
32  reinterpret_cast<Evolve::BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone*>(zone);
33 
34  real_zone->setup(
35  (
36  num_tidal_frequency_breaks
37  ? std::vector<double>(
38  tidal_frequency_breaks,
39  tidal_frequency_breaks + num_tidal_frequency_breaks
40  )
41  : std::vector<double>()
42  ),
43  (
44  num_spin_frequency_breaks
45  ? std::vector<double>(
46  spin_frequency_breaks,
47  spin_frequency_breaks + num_spin_frequency_breaks
48  )
49  : std::vector<double>()
50  ),
51  std::vector<double>(
52  tidal_frequency_powers,
53  tidal_frequency_powers + num_tidal_frequency_breaks + 1
54  ),
55  std::vector<double>(
56  spin_frequency_powers,
57  spin_frequency_powers + num_spin_frequency_breaks + 1
58  ),
59  reference_phase_lag
60  );
61 
62 }

64 DiskBinarySystem *create_star_planet_system(EvolvingStar *star,
65  CPlanet *planet,
66  double initial_semimajor,
67  double initial_eccentricity,
68  double initial_inclination,
69  double disk_lock_frequency,
70  double disk_dissipation_age,
71  double secondary_formation_age)
72 {
73  return reinterpret_cast<DiskBinarySystem*>(

75  *reinterpret_cast<Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(star),
76  *reinterpret_cast<Planet::Planet*>(planet),
77  initial_semimajor,
78  initial_eccentricity,
79  initial_inclination,
80  disk_lock_frequency,
81  disk_dissipation_age,
82  std::max(secondary_formation_age,
83  disk_dissipation_age)
84  )
85  );
86 }

171 void configure_system(DiskBinarySystem *system,
172  double age,
173  double semimajor,
174  double eccentricity,
175  const double *spin_angmom,
176  const double *inclination,
177  const double *periapsis,
178  int evolution_mode)
179 {
180  assert(evolution_mode < TABULATION_EVOL_MODE);
181  reinterpret_cast<Evolve::DiskBinarySystem*>(system)->configure(
182  true,
183  age,
184  semimajor,
185  eccentricity,
186  spin_angmom,
187  inclination,
188  periapsis,
189  static_cast<Core::EvolModeType>(evolution_mode)
190  );
191 }
192 
193 OrbitSolver *evolve_system(DiskBinarySystem *system,
194  double final_age,
195  double max_time_step,
196  double precision,
197  double *required_ages,
198  unsigned num_required_ages,
199  bool print_progress)
200 {
201  std::cerr.setf(std::ios_base::scientific);
202  std::cerr.precision(16);
203  Evolve::OrbitSolver *solver = new Evolve::OrbitSolver(final_age,
204  precision,
205  print_progress);
206 #ifdef NDEBUG
207  try {
208 #endif
209  (*solver)(
210  *reinterpret_cast<Evolve::DiskBinarySystem*>(system),
211  max_time_step,
212  std::list<double>(required_ages,
213  required_ages + num_required_ages)
214  );
215 #ifdef NDEBUG
216  } catch(std::exception)
217  {
218  }
219 #endif
220  return reinterpret_cast<OrbitSolver*>(solver);
221 }
222 
223 void destroy_solver(OrbitSolver *solver)
224 {
225  delete reinterpret_cast<Evolve::OrbitSolver*>(solver);
226 }
227 
228 unsigned num_evolution_steps(OrbitSolver *solver)
229 {
230  return reinterpret_cast<Evolve::OrbitSolver*>(
231  solver
232  )->evolution_ages().size();
233 }
234 
235 template<typename T>
236 inline void list_to_array(const std::list<T> &source, T *destination)
237 {
238  if(destination)
239  std::copy(source.begin(), source.end(), destination);
240 }
241 
243 void get_star_evolution(const EvolvingStar *star_arg,
244  double *envelope_inclination,
245  double *core_inclination,
246  double *envelope_periapsis,
247  double *core_periapsis,
248  double *envelope_angmom,
249  double *core_angmom,
250  bool *wind_saturation)
251 {
252  const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar *star =
253  reinterpret_cast<const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(star_arg);
254  list_to_array(star->envelope().get_evolution_real(Evolve::INCLINATION),
255  envelope_inclination);
256 
257  list_to_array(star->core().get_evolution_real(Evolve::INCLINATION),
258  core_inclination);
259 
260  list_to_array(star->envelope().get_evolution_real(Evolve::PERIAPSIS),
261  envelope_periapsis);
262 
263  list_to_array(star->core().get_evolution_real(Evolve::PERIAPSIS),
264  core_periapsis);
265 
266  list_to_array(
267  star->envelope().get_evolution_real(Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM),
268  envelope_angmom
269  );
270 
271  list_to_array(star->core().get_evolution_real(Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM),
272  core_angmom);
273 
274  list_to_array(star->wind_saturation_evolution(), wind_saturation);
275 }
276 
278 void get_planet_evolution(const CPlanet *planet_arg,
279  double *inclination,
280  double *periapsis,
281  double *angmom)
282 {
283  const Planet::Planet *planet = reinterpret_cast<const Planet::Planet*>(
284  planet_arg
285  );
286 
287  list_to_array(
288  planet->zone().get_evolution_real(Evolve::INCLINATION),
289  inclination
290  );
291  list_to_array(
292  planet->zone().get_evolution_real(Evolve::PERIAPSIS),
293  periapsis
294  );
295  list_to_array(
296  planet->zone().get_evolution_real(Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM),
297  angmom
298  );
299 }

303 void get_binary_evolution(const DiskBinarySystem *system_arg,
304  double *semimajor,
305  double *eccentricity)
306 {
307  const Evolve::DiskBinarySystem *system =
308  reinterpret_cast<const Evolve::DiskBinarySystem*>(system_arg);
309 
310  list_to_array(system->semimajor_evolution(), semimajor);
311 
312  list_to_array(system->eccentricity_evolution(), eccentricity);
313 }
314 
317 void get_solver_evolution(const OrbitSolver *solver_arg,
318  double *age,
319  int *evolution_mode)
320 {
321  const Evolve::OrbitSolver *solver =
322  reinterpret_cast<const Evolve::OrbitSolver*>(solver_arg);
323 
324  list_to_array(solver->evolution_ages(), age);
325 
326  if(evolution_mode)
327  std::copy(solver->mode_evolution().begin(),
328  solver->mode_evolution().end(),
329  evolution_mode);
330 }

332 void get_star_planet_evolution(const OrbitSolver *solver,
333  const DiskBinarySystem *system,
334  const EvolvingStar *star,
335  const CPlanet *planet,
336  double *age,
337  double *semimajor,
338  double *eccentricity,
339  double *envelope_inclination,
340  double *core_inclination,
341  double *envelope_periapsis,
342  double *core_periapsis,
343  double *envelope_angmom,
344  double *core_angmom,
345  double *planet_inclination,
346  double *planet_periapsis,
347  double *planet_angmom,
348  int *evolution_mode,
349  bool *wind_saturation)
350 {
351 
352  get_solver_evolution(solver, age, evolution_mode);
353

356  get_star_evolution(star,
357  envelope_inclination,
358  core_inclination,
359  envelope_periapsis,
360  core_periapsis,

362  core_angmom,
363  wind_saturation);
364 
365  get_planet_evolution(planet,
366  planet_inclination,
367  planet_periapsis,
368  planet_angmom);
369 }

372  const DiskBinarySystem *system,
373  const EvolvingStar *primary,
374  const EvolvingStar *secondary,
375  double *age,

419 void get_star_final_state(const EvolvingStar *star_arg,
420  double *envelope_inclination,
421  double *core_inclination,
422  double *envelope_periapsis,
423  double *core_periapsis,
424  double *envelope_angmom,
425  double *core_angmom,
426  bool *wind_saturation)
427 {
428  const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar *star =
429  reinterpret_cast<const Star::InterpolatedEvolutionStar*>(star_arg);
430 
431  if(envelope_inclination)
432  *envelope_inclination = (
433  star->envelope().get_evolution_real(Evolve::INCLINATION).back()
434  );
435 
436  if(core_inclination)
437  *core_inclination = star->core().get_evolution_real(
438  Evolve::INCLINATION
439  ).back();
440 
441  if(envelope_periapsis)
442  *envelope_periapsis = star->envelope().get_evolution_real(
443  Evolve::PERIAPSIS
444  ).back();
445 
446  if(core_periapsis)
447  *core_periapsis = star->core().get_evolution_real(
448  Evolve::PERIAPSIS
449  ).back();
450 
451  if(envelope_angmom)
452  *envelope_angmom = star->envelope().get_evolution_real(
453  Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM
454  ).back();
455 
456  if(core_angmom)
457  *core_angmom = star->core().get_evolution_real(
458  Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM
459  ).back();
460 
461  if(wind_saturation)
462  *wind_saturation = star->wind_saturation_evolution().back();
463 }
464 
467 void get_planet_final_state(const CPlanet *planet_arg,
468  double *inclination,
469  double *periapsis,
470  double *angmom)
471 {
472  const Planet::Planet *planet = reinterpret_cast<const Planet::Planet*>(
473  planet_arg
474  );
475 
476  if(inclination)
477  *inclination = planet->zone().get_evolution_real(
478  Evolve::INCLINATION
479  ).back();
480 
481  if(periapsis)
482  *periapsis = planet->zone().get_evolution_real(
483  Evolve::PERIAPSIS
484  ).back();
485 
486  if(angmom)
487  *angmom = planet->zone().get_evolution_real(
488  Evolve::ANGULAR_MOMENTUM
489  ).back();
490 }

494 void get_binary_final_state(const DiskBinarySystem *system_arg,
495  double *semimajor,
496  double *eccentricity)
497 {
498  const Evolve::DiskBinarySystem *system =
499  reinterpret_cast<const Evolve::DiskBinarySystem*>(system_arg);
500 
501  if(semimajor)
502  *semimajor = system->semimajor_evolution().back();
503 
504  if(eccentricity)
505  *eccentricity = system->eccentricity_evolution().back();
506 }
507 
510 void get_solver_final_state(const OrbitSolver *solver_arg,
511  double *age,
512  int *evolution_mode)
513 {
514  const Evolve::OrbitSolver *solver =
515  reinterpret_cast<const Evolve::OrbitSolver*>(solver_arg);
516 
517  if(age)
518  *age = solver->evolution_ages().back();
519 
520  if(evolution_mode)
521  *evolution_mode = solver->mode_evolution().back();
522 }
